message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $128. Can you consider that?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more offer, and I'll meet you at $132. What do you think?
I'm still a bit away from that price, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. I'll offer $129. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go up to $129, but I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll meet you at $131. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try one more time. I'll offer $128. Can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go up to $128, but I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $130. What do you think?
I think we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'll offer $127. This is my final offer.
